quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be One.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Life is very short and anxious for those who forget the past, neglect the present, and fear the future.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself?

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.quote: Don’t explain your philosophy. Embody it.

quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.quote: You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
